messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
My Pokémon sleeps in a bed I got from
overseas.I’m very well off, if you haven’t
noticed!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
What? Over already?
Well, that’s fine. Rich people like me don’t fight.
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Oh, no.
My Pokémon is worn out.I’d better let it sleep it off in the
bed I had sent from overseas.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I do this only because I love my
Pokémon. Winning isn’t that important.
